gisans-X-plorer¶

Simple App that interactively helps in the reduction of NICOS GISANS data. Simple App that interactively helps in the reduction of NICOS files for GISA(N|X)S data.

Install - Windows, Mac, Linux; Python 3.6¶

Open a terminal and use pip:

$ pip install gisansexplorer

Run:¶

Once installed, open a terminal and simply call gisansexplorer:

$ gisansexplorer

How To…¶

Developed by Juan M. Carmona Loaiza in collaboration with Alexandros Koutsioumpas.
Maintained by the MLZ Scientific Computing Group.

    • Adjust the beam center position
